reviewText: An awesome movie and fast shipping:)

Please  be advised that the wrong cast is listed on the web site.
the cast listed on the web site is actually for volume 2 of this dvd.
If you order this dvd,the crook who sells this dvd will not refund your money;but will say he will and then refuse to do so after you return the dvd to him.
His explanation for this fraud is that if you had clicked on his listing,the correct cast is shown.
SINCE HE IS THE ONLY SELLER YOU JUST ORDER THE DVD WITHOUT CHECKING FURTHER.
i do not believe that he will be selling on the amazon web site for much lomger!
